Dit maakt VDL ETG T&D onder meer mogelijk voor ASML in het wafer handler project en andere uitdagende projecten. Heb jij interesse om aan dit soort uitdage…
results.title: Senior Mechanical Engineer

results.description: The Analog Designer is member of the CMOS imager design team comprising analog and digital designers, device physicists and technology experts. The primary responsibilities for the candidate will be • Contributions to the architecture and specifications for the analog part of the CMOS imager that need to be developed • The design of the analog circuits of CMOS image sensors • Research, design and evaluation of novel CMOS imager test structures for implementation on foundry shuttle runs • The si…
results.title: Analog Designer bij Teledyne DALSA
